home_preview.heading: First Time Visiting?
home_preview.intro: Here is what makes a Sunday morning at St John's Park easy to step into.

sections.heading: When does church happen?
paragraphs: We gather to worship every Sunday morning at 10:45am. We also run activities during the week for children, local community support, and smaller groups.

sections.heading: What happens in a church service?
paragraphs: The service is usually a little over an hour. We sing together, read the Bible, hear teaching that connects Scripture to everyday life, and spend time in prayer.
On the first Sunday of each month, we also share Communion together.

sections.heading: What about children and young people?
paragraphs: Children are very welcome. Most Sundays there is a children’s activity or children’s club during the service, and we work to help families feel at home.
For more details, visit Park Kids and Park Youth.

gallery.caption: Sundays are friendly, relaxed, and easy to step into.

gallery.caption: There is always time and space to connect with people.
